description.value:
You unleash a small, localized tremor in a @Template[burst|distance:10] within 30 feet. Each creature in the area takes @Damage[(ceil(@actor.level/2)d8)[bludgeoning]|options:area-damage] damage with a @Check[fortitude|against:kineticist|basic|options:area-effect] save against your class DC. A creature that critically fails is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone]. Earth and stone in the area is difficult terrain until the start of your next turn.

Level (+2) The damage increases by 1d8.
